description:
Gao reunites with Master Bunbuku, the mysterious old man who helped him reverse his dragonification. Suzumi senses that there`s more to this stranger than meets the eye.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Paradise? Underworld? Master Bunbuku and Giant Tanuki!
Tengoku? Jigoku? Bunbuku Shishou to Deka Tanuki!!
天国? 地獄? ぶんぶく師匠とデカたぬき!!
